html:
<head>
    <title>Illiterate Engine</title>
    <script>
      

//engine.js

      class Engine {
  constructor() {
    console.log("Engine loading...")

    this.display = new Display(this)
  }
}      

//bootstrap.js

      let engine = null

function bootstrap() {
  engine = new Engine()
}

bootstrap()      

//request.js

      function request(query,callback) {
  const xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
  xhttp.onload = callback
  xhttp.open("GET", "query/"+query, true);
  xhttp.send();
}      

//display.js

      
class Display {
  constructor() {
    this.element = document.getElementById("screen")
    this.screen = this.element.getContext2d()
  }
}      
    </script>
    <style>
      body {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0px;
  margin: 0px;
}

html {
  padding: 0px;
  margin: 0px;
  overflow-y: hidden;
}#screen {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  margin: 0px;
}
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <canvas id="screen">Error loading HTML canvas</canvas>
  </body>
